title: Level Five
description: FROM NEW YORK TIMES BESTSELLING AUTHOR...Edie Carpenter has it all, a hot Detective boyfriend and a successful career as a true crime writer. When she lands the deal to write a book about a woman who’d been kidnapped and held for three years before being released by her captor, Edie has no idea she’s become a hoarder’s obsession.He loves paper and plastic and has filled his isolated farmhouse to the brim. But, what he loves most are the women he hoards, women who look like his mother, women he eventually buries in his rose garden. They are his projects and he’s desperate to make Edie his newest one.He’ll do whatever it takes to get Edie into his hoard.•About the Carla Cassidy lives in the Midwest with her husband, Frank. She's the author of over 125 books and can't think of anything she'd rather do for a living than tell stories.
author: Carla Cassidy
